```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```
```{r attach_yarrr}
library(yarrr)
pirateplot(formula = weight ~ Time, 
           data = ChickWeight,
           pal = "xmen")
```
```{r attach_tidy}
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r explore_data}
head(pirates)
names(pirates)
view(pirates)
```
```{r mean}
#What is mean pirate age
mean(pirates$age)
```
```{r summary}
summary(pirates)
```
```{r max}
#Who is the tallest pirate
max(pirates$height)
```
```{r sex}

 pirate_sex <- table(pirates$sex)
pirate_sex_tidy <- pirates %>%
  group_by(sex)
```
```{r age sex}
aggregate(formula= age~sex, data=pirates, FUN=mean)
```
```{r age_sex_tidy}
pirate_age_sex <- pirate_sex_tidy %>%
  summarise(mean=mean(age))
```
```{r plotting}
ggplot(data=pirates, aes(x=height, y=weight))+geom_point(color="purple",pch=18
                                                      )
```
